say_hi[source]

say_hi(to)

Enthusiastically say hi to someone

say_hi("Bitz")

'Hii Bitz!'
test_eq(say_hi("Alex"),"Hii Alex!")

class SoothSayer[source]

SoothSayer(to)

Yell hi at someone until they are annoyed enough to either reply or flee
